definition: The German word "Gegenwart" refers to the period of time that is happening right now, encompassing the present moment. It is commonly used to describe the current state or condition of things, events, or situations.

examples.german: Die Gegenwart ist der einzige Zeitpunkt, in dem wir handeln können.
examples.english: The present is the only moment in which we can act.

examples.german: Er ist in der Gegenwart sehr präsent.
examples.english: He is very present in the present.
